homePageText.title: Azure Service Fabric Diagnostics
homePageText.description: Use Azure Service Fabric Diagnostics to investigate how your app is performing, diagnose issues, and discover how to improve its reliability. Select the problem category that best matches the information or tool that you're interested in:
homePageText.searchBarPlaceHolder: Search for common problems or error codes

categories.name: Cluster Insights
categories.description: Get recommendations for your configuration, find common issues, and identify possible improvements for reliability.
